project.name: Particle (formerly Spark) Android Cloud SDK library
project.description: The Particle Android Cloud SDK enables Android apps to interact with Particle-powered connected products via the Particle Cloud. Library will allow you to easily manage active user sessions to Particle cloud, query for device info, read and write data to/from Particle Core/Photon devices and (via exposed variables and functions) publish and subscribe events to/from the cloud or to/from devices (coming soon).
